tools/extents.c

00037 /**
00038  * \file extents.c
00039  * \brief Report the extents of a dataset and its meshes.
00040  *
00041  * $Source: /home/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/extents.c,v $
00042  * $Revision: 1.10 $ 
00043  * $Date: 2006/11/17 22:51:25 $
00044  *
00045  * \description
00046  *    Usage: extents [options] dataset [mesh_name]
00047  *
00048  *    Reports the bounding box of each mesh in a dataset and the bounding box
00049  *    of the entired dataset.
00050  *
00051  * \todo ?Add a flag to get overall average of edges?
00052  *
00053  * \modifications
00054  *   - 05/24/2006 WSD Created.
00055  */
00056 
00057 #include <string.h>
00058 #include "fc.h"
00059  
00060 // print extents in format: "  %s = [ %g, %g, %g ] - [ %g, %g, %g ]\n"
00061 static void print_extent(char* label, int numDim, FC_Coords lowpoint, 
00062                 FC_Coords highpoint) {
00063   int i;
00064   printf("  %s = [ %g", label, lowpoint[0]);
00065   for (i = 1; i < numDim; i++)
00066     printf(", %g", lowpoint[i]);
00067   printf(" ] - [ %g", highpoint[0]);
00068   for (i = 1; i < numDim; i++)
00069     printf(", %g", highpoint[i]);
00070   printf(" ]\n");
00071 }
00072 
00073 // combine bounding boxes
00074 // accumulate results in the combined bb
00075 static FC_ReturnCode combine_bb(int numDim, FC_Coords low, FC_Coords high, 
00076                     FC_Coords *lowc, FC_Coords *highc) {
00077   int i;
00078   FC_Coords temp_low, temp_high;
00079 
00080   // assume low & high are real, but lowc & highc might not be
00081   // if lowc,highc is not real copy low/high
00082   for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00083     if ((*highc)[i] < (*lowc)[i]) {
00084       (*lowc)[i] = low[i];
00085       (*highc)[i] = high[i];
00086     }
00087   }
00088 
00089   // do it
00090   for (i = 0; i < numDim; i++) {
00091     temp_low[i] = (*lowc)[i];
00092     temp_high[i] = (*highc)[i];
00093   }
00094   return fc_combineBoundingBoxes(numDim, low, high, temp_low, temp_high, 
00095                      lowc, highc);
00096 }
00097 
00098 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00099   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00100   int i, j;
00101   int numMesh, numDim, ds_numDim = 0, *numSteps, maxNumStep;
00102   FC_Dataset ds;
00103   FC_Mesh *meshes;
00104   FC_Variable *displs, **seqDispls;   
00105   char* file_name = NULL;
00106   char* mesh_name = NULL;
00107   char* displ_name = NULL;
00108   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET;
00109   int doOnlyOne = 0; // flag for whether to do one (1) or all (0);
00110   int doDispl = 0;
00111   int foundDispl = 0, foundSeqDispl = 0;
00112   int* foundDispls, *foundSeqDispls, numNoDispl;
00113   FC_Coords ds_low, ds_high, displ_ds_low, displ_ds_high;
00114   FC_Coords *seqDispl_ds_lows, *seqDispl_ds_highs;
00115 
00116   // handle arguments
00117   if (argc < 2) {
00118   usage:
00119     printf("usage: %s [options] dataset [mesh_name]\n", argv[0]);
00120     printf("options: \n");
00121     printf("   -d var_name   : calc the displaced values using this displacement\n");
00122     printf("                   variable\n");
00123     printf("   -h            : print this help message\n");
00124     printf("   -v            : print warning and error messages\n");   
00125     printf("   -V            : print log and error messages\n");   
00126     printf("\n");
00127     printf("Prints summary of edge lengths on meshes in the dataset.\n");
00128     printf("If a mesh name is provided, prints only a summary for that "
00129            "mesh.\n");
00130     fflush(NULL);
00131     exit(-1);
00132   }
00133   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00134     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-d")) {
00135       doDispl = 1;
00136       i++;
00137       displ_name = argv[i];
00138     }
00139     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00140       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;
00141     }
00142     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00143       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;
00144     }
00145     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) || !strncmp(argv[i], "-", 1))
00146       goto usage;
00147     else {
00148       file_name = argv[i];
00149       if (i+1 < argc) {
00150         i++;
00151         doOnlyOne = 1;
00152         mesh_name = argv[i];
00153       }
00154     }
00155   }
00156   if (!file_name)
00157     goto usage;
00158 
00159   // init library and load dataset
00160   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00161   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00162   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00163   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00164   rc = fc_loadDataset(file_name, &ds);
00165   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to load dataset '%s'", file_name);
00166 
00167   // Get number of meshes and mesh names
00168   if (doOnlyOne) {
00169     FC_Mesh *returnMeshes;
00170     int numReturnMeshes;
00171     numMesh = 1;
00172     meshes = malloc(sizeof(FC_Mesh));
00173     rc = fc_getMeshByName(ds, mesh_name, &numReturnMeshes,&returnMeshes);
00174     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Can't get mesh by name");
00175     if (numReturnMeshes != 1){
00176       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_INPUT_ERROR, "Problems finding (unique) mesh '%s' - found %d matches",
00177              mesh_name, numReturnMeshes);
00178     }
00179     meshes[0] = returnMeshes[0];
00180     free(returnMeshes);
00181   }
00182   else {
00183     rc = fc_getMeshes(ds, &numMesh, &meshes);
00184     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00185   }
00186 
00187   // header
00188   printf("Extents summary for dataset '%s'\n", file_name);
00189   fflush(NULL);
00190   if (numMesh < 0) {
00191     printf("No meshes were found\n");
00192     fflush(NULL);
00193     exit(0);
00194   }
00195   else 
00196     printf("%d meshes\n", numMesh);
00197   fflush(NULL);
00198 
00199   // if displacing, make sure we have displacement variables
00200   if (doDispl) {
00201     foundDispls = (int*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(int));
00202     foundSeqDispls = (int*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(int));
00203     displs = (FC_Variable*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable));
00204     numSteps = (int*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(int));
00205     seqDispls = (FC_Variable**)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00206     if (!foundDispls || !foundSeqDispls || !displs || !seqDispls ||
00207      !numSteps)
00208       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00209               
00210     // try to get handles to vars
00211     numNoDispl = 0;
00212     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00213       foundDispls[i] = 0;
00214       foundSeqDispls[i] = 0;
00215       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueVariableByName(meshes[i],
00216                               displ_name,
00217                               &displs[i]);
00218       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00219 
00220       if (fc_isValidDisplacementVariable(meshes[i], displs[i])) {
00221      foundDispl = 1;
00222      foundDispls[i] = 1;
00223       }
00224 
00225       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i], displ_name,
00226                                  &numSteps[i],
00227                                  &seqDispls[i]);
00228       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00229       
00230       if (seqDispls[i] && 
00231        fc_isValidDisplacementVariable(meshes[i], seqDispls[i][0])){
00232      foundSeqDispl = 1;
00233      foundSeqDispls[i] = 1;
00234       }
00235       if (foundDispls[i] + foundSeqDispls[i] == 0) 
00236      numNoDispl++;
00237     }
00238 
00239  // check
00240     if (numNoDispl == numMesh) {
00241       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Displacement variable '%s' was not found",
00242                   displ_name);
00243     }
00244     else if (numNoDispl > 0) {
00245       int first = 1;
00246       printf("WARNING: the displacement variable does not exist on meshes ");
00247       first = 0;
00248       for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00249      if (foundDispls[i] + foundSeqDispls[i] == 0) {
00250        if (first)
00251          printf("%d", i);
00252        else
00253          printf(", %d", i);
00254      }
00255       }
00256       printf("\n");
00257     }
00258   }
00259 
00260   // initialize overall dataset bb's
00261   if (doDispl) {
00262     maxNumStep = 0;
00263     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00264       if (numSteps[i] > maxNumStep)
00265      maxNumStep = numSteps[i];
00266     }
00267     if (maxNumStep > 0) {
00268       seqDispl_ds_lows = (FC_Coords*)malloc(maxNumStep*sizeof(FC_Coords));
00269       seqDispl_ds_highs = (FC_Coords*)malloc(maxNumStep*sizeof(FC_Coords));     
00270       if (!seqDispl_ds_lows || !seqDispl_ds_highs)
00271      fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00272       for (i = 0; i < maxNumStep; i++) {
00273      for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00274        seqDispl_ds_lows[i][j] = -1;
00275        seqDispl_ds_highs[i][j] = -2;
00276      }
00277       }
00278     }
00279   }
00280   for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00281     ds_low[i] = -1;
00282     ds_high[i] = -2;
00283     displ_ds_low[i] = -1;
00284     displ_ds_high[i] = -2;
00285   }
00286 
00287   // loop over meshes
00288   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00289     FC_Coords lowpoint, highpoint;
00290 
00291     // print mesh name
00292     rc = fc_getMeshName(meshes[i], &mesh_name);
00293     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00294     printf("\n");
00295     printf("Mesh %d: '%s'\n", i, mesh_name);
00296     free(mesh_name);
00297     fflush(NULL);
00298  
00299     // Get bounding box of undisplaced mesh
00300     rc = fc_getMeshBoundingBox(meshes[i], &numDim, &lowpoint, &highpoint);
00301     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to get mesh bounding box");
00302     print_extent("Extent", numDim, lowpoint, highpoint);
00303     if (numDim > ds_numDim)
00304       ds_numDim = numDim;
00305     rc = combine_bb(numDim, lowpoint, highpoint, &ds_low, &ds_high);
00306     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00307 
00308     if (doDispl) { 
00309       // if didn't find displs
00310       if (foundDispls[i] + foundSeqDispls[i] == 0) {
00311      printf("    (Displacement var not found, cannot calc extents)\n");
00312      fflush(NULL);
00313      break;
00314       }
00315 
00316       // do basic displ var
00317       if (foundDispls[i]) {
00318      rc = fc_getDisplacedMeshBoundingBox(meshes[i], displs[i], &numDim,
00319                              &lowpoint, &highpoint);
00320      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to get displaced mesh bounding box");
00321      print_extent("Displ extent", numDim, lowpoint, highpoint);
00322      rc = combine_bb(numDim, lowpoint, highpoint, &displ_ds_low, &displ_ds_high);
00323      fc_exitIfError(rc);
00324       }
00325 
00326       // do a seq displ variable   
00327       if (foundSeqDispls[i]) {
00328      FC_Coords combinedlow, combinedhigh;
00329      for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00330        combinedlow[j] = -1;
00331        combinedhigh[j] = -2;
00332      }
00333      for (j = 0; j < numSteps[i]; j++) {
00334        char strbuf[1028];
00335        rc = fc_getDisplacedMeshBoundingBox(meshes[i], seqDispls[i][j], 
00336                                &numDim, &lowpoint, &highpoint);
00337        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to get displaced mesh bounding box");
00338        sprintf(strbuf, "Displ extent at Step %d", j);
00339        print_extent(strbuf, numDim, lowpoint, highpoint);
00340        rc = combine_bb(numDim, lowpoint, highpoint, &combinedlow, 
00341                  &combinedhigh);
00342        fc_exitIfError(rc);
00343        rc = combine_bb(numDim, lowpoint, highpoint, &seqDispl_ds_lows[j],
00344                  &seqDispl_ds_highs[j]);
00345        fc_exitIfError(rc);
00346      }
00347      print_extent("Displ extent for all Steps", numDim, combinedlow,
00348                combinedhigh);
00349       }
00350     }
00351 
00352     fc_deleteMesh(meshes[i]);
00353   }
00354 
00355   // Summary
00356   if (numMesh > 1) {
00357     printf("\n");
00358     printf("Entire Dataset:\n");
00359     print_extent("Extent", ds_numDim, ds_low, ds_high);
00360     if (doDispl) {
00361       if (foundDispl) {
00362      print_extent("Displ extent", ds_numDim, displ_ds_low, displ_ds_high);
00363       }
00364       if (foundSeqDispl) {
00365      FC_Coords combinedlow, combinedhigh;
00366      for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00367        combinedlow[i] = -1;
00368        combinedhigh[i] = -2;
00369      }
00370      for (i = 0; i < maxNumStep; i++) {
00371        char strbuf[1028];
00372        sprintf(strbuf, "Displ extent at Step %d", i);
00373        print_extent(strbuf, ds_numDim, seqDispl_ds_lows[i],
00374                  seqDispl_ds_highs[i]);
00375        rc = combine_bb(ds_numDim, seqDispl_ds_lows[i], seqDispl_ds_highs[i],
00376                  &combinedlow, &combinedhigh);
00377        fc_exitIfError(rc);
00378      }
00379      print_extent("Displ extent for all Steps", ds_numDim, combinedlow,
00380                combinedhigh);
00381       }
00382     }
00383   }
00384  
00385 
00386   // cleanup
00387   if (doDispl) {
00388     free(foundDispls);
00389     free(foundSeqDispls);
00390     if (maxNumStep > 0) {
00391       free(seqDispl_ds_lows);
00392       free(seqDispl_ds_highs);
00393     }
00394     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++){
00395       if (seqDispls[i]) free(seqDispls[i]);
00396     }
00397     free(numSteps);
00398     free(displs);
00399     free(seqDispls);
00400   }
00401 
00402   // shut down
00403   fc_deleteDataset(ds);
00404   fc_finalLibrary();
00405 
00406   exit(0);
00407 }
Generated on Mon Oct 27 13:25:50 2008 for FCLib by  1.5.5
